title: New air-filled fiber bundle could make endoscopes smaller

title_detail.value: New air-filled fiber bundle could make endoscopes smaller

summary: Researchers have fabricated a new kind of air-filled optical fiber bundle that could greatly improve endoscopes used for medical procedures like minimally invasive surgeries or bronchoscopies.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have fabricated a new kind of air-filled optical fiber bundle that could greatly improve endoscopes used for medical procedures like minimally invasive surgeries or bronchoscopies.
